text: Hannes F. Wagner is a German economist. He is currently associate professor of finance at Bocconi University. ==Education== *PhD in finance and MSc from The Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich *BS in business economics from Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich ==References== == External links == * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:German economists Category:Bocconi University faculty Category:Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich alumni Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Hannes F. Wagner
